result.title: Presentation of a kaleo exhibition in 1 EU cities where partners are located
result.description: The Kaleo exhibition 5 portraits or eventually a new one with the possibility to combine it with the itinerant demonstrator will be showcased in 1 city of a project partner The event of this exhibition that will last a month will be accompanied with dedicated events about the project technologies but also questioning the role of Art and its role linked to solar technology and society

result.title: Final report on TRL progression
result.description: ACEnano will develop the chosen methods towards specified Technology Readiness Levels This will entail active tracking and management of the development process for each method from the outset of the project PNV will act as a Technology Readiness Champion within the project and williEstablish and maintain and up to date record of all method development from innovation research methods through to benchmarking and incorporation into the final characterisation suite and decision treeiiConsult with method developers on TRL targets through all stages of development setting time goals for achievement of specific TRLs promoting the acceleration of technical advances towards the target TRLs specified for each methodology

result.title: Feasibility study for a hybrid wheelset for a tram of light rail vehicle and/or feasibility study for a hybrid wheelset with composite axle
result.description: This deliverable will present in a written report the result of the feasibility study for the chosen applicationsResults of the analysis of the possible configurations and outline design of the configuration chosen for the successive analysisResults of the optimization of the shape and the composite layup supported by finite element analyses Presentation of a dimensioned design of a preliminary solution and its manufacturing processAnalysis of the state of the art of NDT inspection for railway axles and wheelset and composite materials presentation of the results of the study aiming at identifying the existing techniques suitable for the proposed designAnalysis of dynamic behaviour and vibroacoustic analysis of the proposed solution

result.title: Integrated report on civil society organisations as barriers and enablers
result.description: Report based on national reports provided by participants synthesizing the main findings of WP4 consisting of a a comparative assessment of the perspectives and experiences of pre and post2014 migrants refugees and asylum seekers in all the countries we study accompanied by a set of best practices or lessons learned with regard to how civil society organizations facilitate or hinder individual pathways to integration in employment and society more generally and b the findings of the organizational analysis including the networks and activities of organizations that are active in the field of migration and a critical assessment of their role as barriers and enablers for social and labour market integration

result.title: Integrated report on social partners, barriers and enablers
result.description: Report based on the national reports provided by the participants synthesizing the main findings prepared by the participants The integrated report will consist of a comparative assessment of the survey findings the interviews findings and the best practices and will be complemented by a contextual analysis of the industrial relations regime as well as an examination of the impact of the refugee crisis on each country we study to explain the reasons for the noninvolvement of social partners
